sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-select :disabled="isDisabled" :placeholder="$t('i18nView.selectPlaceholder')" @change="doChange"
             class="filter-item" clearable filterable multiple v-model="multiSelectValue">
    <el-option :disabled="setDisabled(item.code)" :key="item.code"
               :label="hideCode ? item.codename : item.code +':'+item.codename" :value="item.code"
               v-for="item in options"></el-option>
  </el-select>
</template>

<script>

  import {mapGetters} from 'vuex'

  export default {
    name: 'MultiSelect',
    props: {
      codetype: {
        type: String,
        required: true
      },
      hideCode: {
        type: Boolean,
        required: false,
        default: false
      },
      secondLevel: {
        type: Boolean,
        required: false,
        default: false
      },
      disabled: {
        type: Boolean,
        required: false
      }, filter: {
        type: String,
        required: false
      },
      value: {
        type: Array
      },
      disabledCodeArray: {
        type: Array,
        required: false,
        default: () => {
          return []
        }
      }
    },
    mounted() {
      this.buildSelectOptions()
      this.multiSelectValue = this.value
      if (this.disabled) {
        this.isDisabled = this.disabled
      }
    },
    methods: {
      buildSelectOptions() {
        if (!this.secondLevel) {
          this.options = this.ldcodes[this.codetype]
          if (this.filter) {
            this.options = this.filterOptions(this.filter, this.options)
          }
        } else {
          if (this.filter) {
            let secondKey = this.codetype + "." + this.filter
            this.options = this.ldcodes[secondKey]
          }
        }
      },
      doChange(val) {
        this.$emit('change', val)
      },
      setDisabled(code) {
        return !!this._.includes(this.disabledCodeArray, code)
      }
    },
    data() {
      return {
        options: [],
        multiSelectValue: [],
        isDisabled: false

      }
    },
    watch: {
      value(val, oldVal) {
        this.multiSelectValue = val
      },
      multiSelectValue(val, oldVal) {
        if (val != oldVal) {
          this.$emit('input', this.multiSelectValue);
        }
      },
      disabled(val, oldVal) {
        if (val != oldVal) {
          this.isDisabled = val
        }
      }, filter(val, oldVal) {
        if (val != oldVal) {
          this.multiSelectValue = []
          this.buildSelectOptions()
        }
      }

    },
    computed: {
      ...mapGetters([
        'ldcodes'
      ])
    }
  }
</script>

<style>

</style>
